cast.name: 加里·赖特波迪 Gary Lightbody

this_title: BBC Children In Need Rocks The Royal Albert Hall
trans_title: 2009年BBC年度慈善募捐会：为了需要帮助的孩子们
introduction: BBC一年一度的慈善募捐会，今年在伦敦皇家阿尔伯特音乐厅隆重举行。本次音乐会共募集捐款超过200万英镑。Children in Need Rocks the Royal Albert HallHeld on 12 November, Children in Need Rocks the Royal Albert Hall was an evening of live music in London's Royal Albert Hall, organised by Gary Barlow. The concert included sets by Sir Paul McCartney, Cheryl Cole, Katherine Jenkins, Leona Lewis, Robbie Williams, Mika, Lily Allen, Dizzee Rascal, Muse, Dame Shirley Bassey, Snow Patrol and Take That, Paulo Nutini and was hosted by Chris Moyles. The event raised over two million pounds for the campaign.
chinese_title: 2009年BBC年度慈善募捐会：为了需要帮助的孩子们
foreign_title: BBC Children In Need Rocks The Royal Albert Hall
